data.title: La défense de l’identité provençale dans I’oeuvre de Frédéric Mistral ( seconde partie )
meta_keywords: Afrikaans; language; research; text; taal; film; translation; world; mens; films; gender; people; isiZulu; human; political; students; black; press; social; werk; plays; cultural; apartheid
data.meta_description: Literator publishes research articles and essays on linguistics and literature in general, but focuses in particular on the (comparative) study of South African languages and literatures and other cultural phenomena across language, media and cultural boundaries (examples of topics would be: different manifestations of Post-Modernism, the interaction between visual arts and literature, the representation of the South African War in literature, language attitudes and language policy).
